attributes.action: Revert to the correct pronunciation of Holyrood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Rood" is an old word for "cross", usually meaning the crucifixion cross of Jesus; thus the name is equivalent to "Holy Cross." The correct name is  Holy-rood however recently politicians, newcasters have been using the wrong name "Hollyrood" We should revert to Holyrood as it has been known as that since the early 12th centuary.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
